name: Childhood Memories (Alexthehuman3)
description:
Immerse yourself in your childhood memories through a series of minigames that will make your heartbeat back in the days. We have -

- Bicycle Race with friends

- Making sure your Ice Cream doesn't fly off your cone

- Trying not to Injure yourself in the park!

- The best part about this, trying to stay up all night without your parent knowing!

More minigames will come at some point. I swear I will go back to it after my university Semester is over!

Comment your best score if you feel like it!
